topics.title: Define the Initial Menu Screen
topics.string:
File:
~/Config/Init.json


This config file defines the WorldWeaver (WW) default menu screen. The
default value is shown below. This can be altered as you see fit.


          _ _ _         _   _ _ _ _                     
         | | | |___ ___| |_| | | | |___ ___ _ _ ___ ___ 
         | | | | . |  _| | . | | | | -_| .'| | | -_|  _|
         |_____|___|_| |_|___|_____|___|__,|\_/|___|_|  
                                                        
  ______________________________________________________________
  |                                                            | 
  |   Welcome to the WorldWeaver text-based game engine.       |
  |                                                            |
  |____________________________________________________________|
  |                                                            |
  |   To list the available games use:                         |
  |   list games                                               |
  |                                                            |
  |   To start a new game use:                                 |
  |   play <Game name (Case sensitive)>                        |
  |                                                            |
  |   To resume a game use:                                    |
  |   resume <Game name (Case sensitive)>                      |
  |                                                            |
  |   To quit the current game use:                            |
  |   quit                                                     |
  |                                                            |
  |   To exit WorldWeaver use:                                 |
  |   exit                                                     |
  |                                                            |
  |                                                            |
  |   To view this menu use:                                   |
  |   menu                                                     |
  |                                                            |
  |   For Help use:                                            |
  |   help                                                     |
  |                                                            |
  |____________________________________________________________|
